meanings.definition: The art or technique of making stereographs.
meanings.sent1: She learned about stereographies in her photography class.
meanings.sent2: His collection of stereographies showcased different landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The artist's passion for stereographies was evident in every piece.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gallery of stereographies, each memory a vivid image.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of stereographies captured moments in time like no other art form.

meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a rare stereographies display.
meanings.sent2: He inherited a valuable stereographies from his grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The stereographies on the shelf seemed to tell stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a treasure trove of stereographies, each holding a memory.
meanings.sent5: The stereographies in the museum were a window to history for the visitors.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of creating three-dimensional images.
meanings.sent1: She excelled in her stereographies class, mastering the art of depth perception.
meanings.sent2: The professor's expertise in stereographies was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The children found joy in creating their own stereographies with clay.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a canvas for stereographies, each idea popping out in 3D.
meanings.sent5: The world of stereographies opened up new dimensions of creativity for the students.
